data.event: In 1800 the Indiana Territory was created with Vincennes (Knox County) as its capital.
Born in 1772, he immigrated to America 22 years later.

The year 1813 saw the move of the territorial capital east from Vincennes to Corydon and the creation of Gibson County.

event.title: early 1814, settlers to this area were asking

data.event: By early 1814, settlers to this area were asking for a "seat of justice," or county seat.
